head.supplied: 5/8/85 ¶ ¶ In reply to your letter of yesterday, ¶ dear Mr Barnard, I beg to say, that I have no copies of the three sets of the educational collection of dried plants left in my Department; but I b...

div.p: FNCV 002-019 Archives, Field Naturalists Club of Victoria, Melbourne.

In reply to your letter of yesterday,
Letter not found. dear Mr Barnard, I beg to say, that I have no copies of the three sets of the educational collection of dried plants left in my Department; but I believe, that one or two copies of the whole are still available in the Office of the Chief Secretary, left of those sent to the Mechanics Institutes and free libraries some years ago. If you adressed the hon Graham Berry, I have no doubt, that he would gladly grant the Club a copy of the three sets; each contains 50 species of plants, should yet o[ne] be left.
